Summary: UI Modernization: Modern & Simple
Description: Refactor the Android Compose UI for lower interaction cost, clearer hierarchy, and stronger consistency across Today/History/Settings/Edit flows.

Summary: UI-103 Reduce settings write churn
Description: Use local draft state and commit on finish/focus loss for high-frequency inputs (radius slider, default city text). Files: settings/SettingsScreenV2.kt

Summary: UI-104 Improve export action layout on small screens
Description: Replace 3-column export CTA row with mobile-safe stacked/2-step layout. File: settings/SettingsScreenV2.kt

Summary: UI-105 Add loading state for settings bootstrap
Description: Show loading placeholder when reminder settings are not loaded yet. File: settings/SettingsScreenV2.kt

Summary: UI-106 Add stable keys to LazyLists
Description: Add key params for history/export lists to improve scroll and recomposition stability. Files: history/HistoryScreen.kt, export/ExportPreviewScreen.kt

Summary: UI-107 Restrict edit date swipe gesture to header
Description: Move horizontal swipe navigation from whole edit sheet to date header area only. File: edit/EditEntrySheet.kt

Summary: UI-201 Collapsible settings sections with summaries
Description: Introduce expandable sections in Settings to reduce visual load and scrolling. File: settings/SettingsScreenV2.kt

Summary: UI-202 Make work defaults editable in Settings V2
Description: Allow editing work start/end and break defaults from Settings V2, including ViewModel update APIs.

Summary: UI-203 Add sticky primary action zone in Today
Description: Keep the next important action visible in Today to reduce taps and scroll-back. File: today/TodayScreenV2.kt

Summary: UI-204 Persist compact review warning in Today
Description: Replace fully dismissible review banner with compact persistent reminder while review is unresolved. Files: today/TodayScreenV2.kt, today/ReviewSheet.kt

Summary: UI-205 History sticky mini-filter bar + advanced sheet
Description: Keep key filters sticky and move advanced options into bottom sheet/compact panel. File: history/HistoryScreen.kt

Summary: UI-206 Condense week/month cards in History
Description: Show summary-first cards with optional expanded details to reduce visual noise. File: history/HistoryScreen.kt

Summary: UI-207 Sticky save bar and sectioned edit form
Description: Keep save action reachable and split edit form into clearer, cheaper sections. File: edit/EditEntrySheet.kt

Summary: UI-301 Consolidate shared UI system
Description: Unify overlapping action/button/card systems from ui/common and ui/components.

Summary: UI-302 Unify date/time picker dialogs
Description: Create one shared dialog layer for date/time pickers and use it across screens.

Summary: UI-303 Resolve legacy/orphan UI paths
Description: Remove or wire legacy ReminderSettingsScreen and isolated TravelSection path.

Summary: UI-304 Replace hardcoded strings and normalize a11y labels
Description: Move hardcoded labels to resources and align content descriptions across screens.

Summary: UI-305 Performance baseline pass for critical screens
Description: Run compose-focused perf pass for Today/History/Edit hotspots and document improvements.
